title: Commission Regulation (EC) No 742/98 of 2 April 1998 amending Council Regulation (EEC) No 1101/89 as regards the conditions which apply to the putting into service of new capacity for dry cargo vessels in inland waterway transport
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EC) No 742/98 of 2 April 1998 amending Council Regulation (EEC) No 1101/89 as regards the conditions which apply to the putting into service of new capacity for dry cargo vessels in inland waterway transport
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
The following fourth indent is added to Article 8(1)(a) of Regulation (EEC) No 1101/89:
'- in the case of dry cargo vessels as provided for in Article 3(1) of Regulation (EEC) No 1102/89, and by way of derogation from the first indent, "one and a half times" shall be replaced by "1,25 times" with effect from 1 April 1998.`

This Regulation shall enter into force on the 20th day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 2 April 1998.
For the Commission
Neil KINNOCK
Member of the Commission
